document_data.name: Umberto Noblin
document_data.mainbody: '''Umberto Noblin''' was a [[Neverwintian]] [[noble]] and preeminent historian in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. His field of expertise was the history of [[Vecna]].
document_data.Description: Umberto had a discerning palate and a notable appreciation for [[magical]] cuisine. He especially enjoyed food crafted with magical means, such as the berries produced by the ''[[goodberry]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: In the late 1490s [[DR]],{{Vecna-time}} Umberto and three other nobles were kidnapped by a cult of Vecna and taken to [[Neverwinter]]'s graveyard, [[Neverdeath]].
